Producer: Jackie Chan, Charlie Coker, David Henry Gerson, Min Li, Damien Saccani, Esmond Ren
Production Co: Cider Mill Pictures, InterTitle Films, Talent International Media, JC Group International, Talent International Film Cultural Company, Dasym Enetertainment
Synopsis: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle a Chinese criminal.
Title: Skiptrace
